attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the government to ban all forms of banning. Banning will be outlawed and a £5,000 fine will be introduced for merely talking about banning. All bans since 1997 will be banned. The British people want to retain their freedom. If someone wants to smoke in a pub, then why not? If someone wants to drink alcohol then there’s nothing stopping you. Life’s too short to worry about pathetic little things. Its time all banners were banned.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
